meanings.definition: Blocked or obstructed; full of congestion.

examples.sentence: O trânsito está muito congestionado hoje.
examples.translation: The traffic is very congested today.

examples.sentence: Meu nariz está congestionado por causa do resfriado.
examples.translation: My nose is congested because of the cold.

meanings.definition: Overcrowded; having an excessive amount of something.

examples.sentence: A cidade está congestionada de turistas nesta época do ano.
examples.translation: The city is overcrowded with tourists at this time of year.
